lst.name: sentence
lst.str: And while the financial instry's hi-tech resources have been able to handle the crisis, the sudden surge in trading volume will likely force the exchanges and securities firms to revamp their computer systems and communications networks several years earlier than they had planned, industry officials said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "The computers might turn out to be the heroes of this whole thing," added DuWayne Peterson, executive vice president of technology at Merrill Lynch and Co Inc.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Meanwhile, New York Telephone Co said Monday's panic selling did not wreak havoc on its telephone system.
